title: Temperature Trends Dashboard Tool expanded to include three more states
content:
This screen capture from the expanded tool shows station locations. Credit: SCIPP
This screen capture from the expanded tool shows station locations. Credit: SCIPP
The Texas Temperature Trends Dashboard, now renamed the “SCIPP Temperature Trends Dashboard”, has been updated to include all states in the SCIPP region. The original 75 Texas stations have been expanded to include 27 stations in Arkansas, 28 stations from Louisiana, and 11 stations from Oklahoma. The database was also updated to include 2020-2022 temperatures, extending the trend period to 52 years (1970-2022).
